description: T.1 Austrian Pine - Crown reduce by approx 1-2m to previous reduction points. T.2 Yew - Reduce height by approx 1m and trim garden side. T.3 Hawthorn - Crown reduce by approx 1m. T.4 Lawson Cypress - Fell. T.5 Lawson Cypress - Fell. T.6 Lawson Cypress - Reduce height by 1-2m to previous reduction points and trim garden side. T.7 Japanese Cedar - Fell. T.8 Lawson Cypress - Fell. T.9 Leyland Cypress - Reduce height by 1-2m to previous reduction points and trim garden side. T.10 Monterey Cypress - Reduce garden side by 0.5-1m. T.11 Magnolia - Fell. T.12 Yew - Trim garden side by approx. 0.5m. T.13 Yew - Trim garden side by approx. 0.5m. T.14 Weeping Birch - Crown lift to 2-2.5m.
